body:
Comment 6: 
> ...I doubt fixing MinGW/GNU Make has anything to do with Go...

Agreed.

> ... Also while don't use spaces in pathnames is the golden rule of programming, using
double quotes on environment variables you want used as one word is also the golden rule
of unix sh programming-doesn't take a Wizard to figure it out either. ...

Agreed, bar we all understand, it might not build after all. You're welcome to propose
your change: http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html. Alternatively, I could do it myself.
Just let me know.
